snippet.title: Ace Prosecutor Zero - Play it Now [Trailer]
snippet.description:
Ace Prosecutor Zero is a fangame inspired by Capcom’s “Ace Attorney” with a new story, case and characters.
You play on the role of a prosecutor hired to solve a problem. In the meanwhile, you’ll solve cases and find out what really happened.
The project is completely free and translated in English and Italian.

Website: http://aceprosecutorzero.wordpress.com/
Question & Answer: https://aceprosecutorzero.wordpress.com/question-answer/
Full Credits: https://aceprosecutorzero.wordpress.com/credits/
Ko-Fi Page for donations: https://ko-fi.com/ikiwed
Twitter: http://twitter.com/ikiwed
Zero is playable in EndCycle vs Ace Attorney mod: https://youtu.be/a3kEzUIpjaw
Trailer in Italian: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xZoMBOObbeI

With this translation/semi localization I brought a slight revision on buttons and pop-ups, added a new original music and small fixes here and there. I used all my power in possession to make it as good as possible. My vocabulary has greatly improved since "Steamed Hams but It's Ace Attorney", thanks to the feedback provided. But it's not as perfect as a native English, so I would understand if you don't like it.

I decided to stop producing big contents like Ace Prosecutor Zero and EndCycle vs Ace Attorney (altough it's probable I'll make small updates for the last one I mentioned). 
My priorities changed. And my top-notch priority is to continue this new videogame I'm trying to make.

Credits for the video:
Dr.Ocsid (Voice of Zero): https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGIE1Ic2-Oe8av9V2xFmG7Q
CanIHasPie (Voice of Whitney): https://twitter.com/CanIHasPie
Audionetwork.com - "Un Sospiro" by Cyril Giroux, Alessandro Gambassi, Campbell E. Browhing & Pablo Loye.
